Title: Centaur is The Best Tank: Durable Build

ItemTooltips.travel_boots: Best boot for centaur. With it you can be everywhere.
ItemTooltips.heart: MUST HAVE!!!!! Makes you really tough.
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: I recommend it because of evasion and disarm.

AbilityTooltips.centaur_hoof_stomp: Helpful 3 sec stun. But it has small stun. Blink Dagger, Shadow Blade and Stampede can help you a lot.
AbilityTooltips.centaur_double_edge: Very powerful ability. 400 magic damage hurts.
AbilityTooltips.centaur_return: The best thing is that it works with evasion. Enemy misses, but takes damage.
AbilityTooltips.centaur_stampede: OMG What the F*** was that?! - all your enemies will think after their death.
